LanguageData.OE_Pearlapple_Fruit.label: pearlapple fruit
LanguageData.OE_Pearlapple_Fruit.description: Obsidias juicy crystal fruit that can be used as a meat substitute.
LanguageData.OE_Jumy_Berries.label: jumy berries
LanguageData.OE_Jumy_Berries.description: Small Obsidias berries are tasty and sweet.
LanguageData.OE_FungalWoodLog.label: fungal wood
LanguageData.OE_FungalWoodLog.description: Unique wood. More durable and less flammable, while being lighter.
LanguageData.OE_FungalWoodLog.tools.log.label: log
LanguageData.OE_DragonianWoodLog.label: dragonian wood
LanguageData.OE_DragonianWoodLog.description: Rare type of wood. Very valuable, durable and beautiful, yet heavy.
LanguageData.OE_DragonianWoodLog.tools.log.label: log
LanguageData.OE_Syntherius.label: syntherius
LanguageData.OE_Syntherius.description: Unique Obsidias resource. Used to synthesize other resources, craft weapons, and other industries in Obsidia.
LanguageData.OE_EGOSeed.label: EGO seed
LanguageData.OE_EGOSeed.description: The seed of an EGO tree. It can be planted to create a new EGO tree. Also used in genetic experiments or for amalgam gestating.
LanguageData.OE_EGOSeed.comps.CompAnalyzableUnlockRes: By studying the EGO Seed, {PAWN_labelShort} has acquired the insight needed for the research project(s) {RESEARCH}.\n\nYour researchers can now use research benches to begin researching how to actually use the technology.
Can be analyzed by a colonist.
LanguageData.OE_Pearlpeach_Fruit.label: pearlpeach fruit
LanguageData.OE_Pearlpeach_Fruit.description: Obsidias juicy crystal fruit that can be used as a meat substitute.
